question: 能帮我可视化出研发部门的组织架构吗？首席研发官是 David  Wright，他的团队包括研发经理  Patrick  Young  和实验室主管 Judy  Grey 。Patrick  Young  负责研发团队，成员有研发工程师 Natalie  Fox  和项目经理 Ian  Clark 。Judy  Grey  管理实验室，团队包括实验室技术员 Nancy  Brown  和实验室助理 Alan  White。
response: {"type":"organization-chart","data":{"name":"David Wright","description":"首席研发官","children":[{"name":"Patrick Young","description":"研发经理","children":[{"name":"Natalie Fox","description":"研发工程师"},{"name":"Ian Clark","description":"项目经理"}]},{"name":"Judy Grey","description":"实验室主管","children":[{"name":"Nancy Brown","description":"实验室技术员"},{"name":"Alan White","description":"实验室助理"}]}]}}
answer: {"type":"organization-chart","data":{"name":"David  Wright","description":"Chief  Research  Officer","children":[{"name":"Patrick  Young","description":"Research  and  Development  Manager","children":[{"name":"Natalie  Fox","description":"R&D Engineer"},{"name":"Ian  Clark","description":"Project  Manager"}]},{"name":"Judy  Grey","description":"Lab  Supervisor","children":[{"name":"Nancy  Brown","description":"Lab  Technician"},{"name":"Alan  White","description":"Lab  Assistant"}]}]}}
reference: 组织架构图 - Organization Chart 基础概念
思维导图 - Mind Map 使用示例

question: Emily Davis 是公司的首席运营官，她的团队包括运营经理 James Miller 和项目经理 Sarah Wilson。James Miller 负责管理运营团队，团队成员包括运营分析师 Kevin Brown 和流程优化专员 Rachel Green。Sarah Wilson 负责管理项目团队，团队成员包括项目协调员 Amy White 和项目助理 David Black。用组织架构图可视化。
response: {"type":"organization-chart","data":{"name":"Emily Davis","description":"Chief Operating Officer","children":[{"name":"James Miller","description":"Operations Manager","children":[{"name":"Kevin Brown","description":"Operations Analyst"},{"name":"Rachel Green","description":"Process Optimization Specialist"}]},{"name":"Sarah Wilson","description":"Project Manager","children":[{"name":"Amy White","description":"Project Coordinator"},{"name":"David Black","description":"Project Assistant"}]}]}}
answer: {"type":"organization-chart","data":{"name":"Emily Davis","description":"Chief Operating Officer","children":[{"name":"James Miller","description":"Operations Manager","children":[{"name":"Kevin Brown","description":"Operations Analyst"},{"name":"Rachel Green","description":"Process Optimization Specialist"}]},{"name":"Sarah Wilson","description":"Project Manager","children":[{"name":"Amy White","description":"Project Coordinator"},{"name":"David Black","description":"Project Assistant"}]}]}}

question: 我想了解一下财务部的组织架构。首席财务官是 Jerry  Brown，他的直属下属包括会计经理  Sara  Hill  和财务分析师 Mark  Ray 。Sara  Hill  带领会计团队，团队成员有资深会计师 Olivia  Tan  和助理会计师 Kevin  Lee 。Mark  Ray  负责财务分析，团队成员有财务分析师 Chris  Green  和经济学家 Emily  Stone 。请将上述信息可视化出来。

question: 你能帮我生成一个图表来展示公司的高管团队结构吗？比如 CEO 是 John  Doe，他手下有  COO Jane  Smith  和 CFO Robert  Brown 。Jane  Smith  负责运营部门，团队成员有运营经理 Alice  Johnson  和运营分析师 Bob  Black 。Robert  Brown  负责财务部门，团队成员有财务经理 Charlie  White  和财务分析师 Diana  Green 。
response: {"type":"organization-chart","data":{"name":"John Doe","description":"CEO","children":[{"name":"Jane Smith","description":"COO","children":[{"name":"Alice Johnson","description":"运营经理"},{"name":"Bob Black","description":"运营分析师"}]},{"name":"Robert Brown","description":"CFO","children":[{"name":"Charlie White","description":"财务经理"},{"name":"Diana Green","description":"财务分析师"}]}]}}
answer: {"type":"organization-chart","data":{"name":"John  Doe","description":"Chief  Executive  Officer","children":[{"name":"Jane  Smith","description":"Chief  Operating  Officer","children":[{"name":"Alice  Johnson","description":"Operations  Manager"},{"name":"Bob  Black","description":"Operations  Analyst"}]},{"name":"Robert  Brown","description":"Chief  Financial  Officer","children":[{"name":"Charlie  White","description":"Finance  Manager"},{"name":"Diana  Green","description":"Finance  Analyst"}]}]}}

鱼骨图 - Fishbone Diagram 图表用法 数据要求

question: 组织架构图显示高管团队结构，首席执行官 Mark  Johnson  统筹公司整体战略及运营。其下设多个部门以支持业务发展。首席技术官 Emma  Carter  负责领导技术研发部门，其中包含软件开发部与硬件工程部。软件开发部由高级开发经理 Daniel  Lee  领导，他的团队包括前端开发小组、后端开发小组和测试小组，分别由团队负责人 Sarah  Walker、James  Smith  和 Lisa  Turner  带领。硬件工程部则由硬件架构师 Kevin  Brown  和设备设计专家 Rachel  Green  共同管理。此外，首席运营官 Laura  Williams  负责公司运营部和客户支持部。运营部由运营经理 John  Clark  领导，他的团队包括物流协调员、采购专员和库存管理员。客户支持部由支持经理 Nancy  Davis  统领，其下属团队包括客户服务代表、技术支持专家和客户满意度分析员。同时，首席财务官 Michael  Martin  负责财务部事务，分设预算分析组与财务报告组。预算分析组由预算分析师 Anthony  Scott  领导，而财务报告组则由财务顾问 Jennifer  Adams  负责。人力资源部由首席人力资源官 Angela  Reed  领导，涵盖招聘、员工培训与发展、薪酬福利管理。每个职能模块由各自的主管分别管理，如招聘主管 Robert  Gray、培训与发展主管  Emily  White  和薪酬福利主管 Paul  Harris 。每位主管都有一支专业团队支持其负责的职能模块，确保公司人力资源运作的有效性和员工的满意度。
response: {"type":"organizationalChart","data":[{"name":"Mark Johnson","title":"首席执行官","children":[{"name":"Emma Carter","title":"首席技术官","children":[{"name":"Daniel Lee","title":"高级开发经理","children":[{"name":"Sarah Walker","title":"前端开发小组负责人"},{"name":"James Smith","title":"后端开发小组负责人"},{"name":"Lisa Turner","title":"测试小组负责人"}]},{"name":"Kevin Brown","title":"硬件架构师"},{"name":"Rachel Green","title":"设备设计专家"}]},{"name":"Laura Williams","title":"首席运营官","children":[{"name":"John Clark","title":"运营经理","children":[{"name":"物流协调员"},{"name":"采购专员"},{"name":"库存管理员"}]},{"name":"Nancy Davis","title":"支持经理","children":[{"name":"客户服务代表"},{"name":"技术支持专家"},{"name":"客户满意度分析员"}]}]},{"name":"Michael Martin","title":"首席财务官","children":[{"name":"Anthony Scott","title":"预算分析师"},{"name":"Jennifer Adams","title":"财务顾问"}]},{"name":"Angela Reed","title":"首席人力资源官","children":[{"name":"Robert Gray","title":"招聘主管"},{"name":"Emily White","title":"培训与发展主管"},{"name":"Paul Harris","title":"薪酬福利主管"}]}]}],"title":"高管团队结构"}
answer: {"type":"organization-chart","data":{"name":"Mark  Johnson","description":"Chief  Executive  Officer","children":[{"name":"Emma  Carter","description":"Chief  Technology  Officer","children":[{"name":"Daniel  Lee","description":"Senior  Development  Manager","children":[{"name":"Sarah  Walker","description":"Frontend  Development  Team  Leader"},{"name":"James  Smith","description":"Backend  Development  Team  Leader"},{"name":"Lisa  Turner","description":"Testing  Team  Leader"}]},{"name":"Kevin  Brown","description":"Hardware  Architect","children":[{"name":"Rachel  Green","description":"Device  Design  Expert"}]}]},{"name":"Laura  Williams","description":"Chief  Operating  Officer","children":[{"name":"John  Clark","description":"Operations  Manager","children":[{"name":"物流协调员","description":"Logistics  Coordinator"},{"name":"采购专员","description":"Procurement  Specialist"},{"name":"库存管理员","description":"Inventory  Administrator"}]},{"name":"Nancy  Davis","description":"Support  Manager","children":[{"name":"客户服务代表","description":"Customer  Service  Representative"},{"name":"技术支持专家","description":"Technical  Support  Specialist"},{"name":"客户满意度分析员","description":"Customer  Satisfaction  Analyst"}]}]},{"name":"Michael  Martin","description":"Chief  Financial  Officer","children":[{"name":"Anthony  Scott","description":"Budget  Analyst","children":[]},{"name":"Jennifer  Adams","description":"Financial  Consultant","children":[]}]},{"name":"Angela  Reed","description":"Chief  Human  Resources  Officer","children":[{"name":"Robert  Gray","description":"Recruitment  Manager","children":[]},{"name":"Emily  White","description":"Training  and  Development  Manager","children":[]},{"name":"Paul  Harris","description":"Compensation  and  Benefits  Manager","children":[]}]}]}}

question: 我需要一个图表来清晰地展示我们公司的组织架构，特别是人力资源部门。Sophia  Johnson  是首席人力资源官，她有两个人直接向她汇报：人力资源经理 Tom  White  和人力资源专员 Lisa  Black 。Tom  White  的团队包括招聘专员 Michael  Green  和招聘助理 Anna  Brown 。Lisa  Black  的团队包括培训专员 Bob  Green  和培训助理 Diana  White 。
